sentences.en: Light reveals the subtle alteration of things, the sly or calamitous impermanence or mortal life.
sentences.cn: 事物的细微变动, 人生的狡猾,倏忽无常,一一都在光中显露出来.

sentences.en: We are exposed to the most calamitous accidents.
sentences.cn: 我们遭受着极大的灾难.

sentences.en: When central banks put themselves at the disposal of finance ministries, the results can be calamitous.
sentences.cn: 当央行让自己听命于财政部长时, 结果可能是灾难性的.

trans.tran_cn: 灾难的，悲惨的，多灾多难，惨重
trans.tran_en: If you describe an event or situation as calamitous, you mean it is very unfortunate or serious
